pr_title: Updated the ivarators to wait to add runnables to the ivarator execut…

timeline.message: Updated the ivarators to wait to add runnables to the ivarator executor until those runnables have a valid source.

timeline.author: ivakegg

replies.bodyText: perhaps add comment that this should only be used for the unsorted case
replies.author: ivakegg

timeline.bodyText: Does the QueryIterator still need to implement SourceFactory after these changes?
timeline.author: ivakegg

replies.bodyText: Yes, because it is used by the SourceManager which determines how many non-ivarator iterators can be made.
replies.author: jwomeara

timeline.bodyText: does this deepCopy do the opening of the RFiles, or is that lazy and not done until the first seek?  Just curious if we need to create these lazily.
timeline.author: ivakegg

replies.bodyText: Now you've done it...  Fix coming soon...
replies.author: jwomeara

timeline.bodyText: I think the fst check needs to be first the way we were doing before.  If we are favoring the fst too much then the fst threshold needs to be set larger.
timeline.author: ivakegg

timeline.message: Updated to use pool artifact which is already part of the assembly.
